name: You Have to Smoke The Game
name_original: You Have to Smoke The Game
description:
A very WIP game that I've been making for too long.

Yeah. It's a platformer...uh.

Yeah.

Enjoy! \.o./

This game I couldn't make alone - definitely. In no order, here are some cool dudes who played the game beforehand. Beta testers, people who helped motivate, as well as anything else.

Farp, Soap, Muffin (also helped with dialogue and various other things! :D), Envy, Parad0x, Theep, Aurius, Joshy, Tobi, Ryan, Dill, Mark, Drake, Graves.

( if I forgot someone, just tell me :> )

UPDATE: The World 2 Demo is OUT! Holy Heckeroni. I really, REALLY hope y'all like this update as much as me and my friends have - a TON of effort was put in to this.

As usual - Enjoy!! :D
